color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc: The color to be attributed to the indicator (the underline) of the active tab
color.description_zh: 类星体调色板中组件的颜色名称

side.description: Side to place the timeline entries in dense and comfortable layout; For loose layout it gets overridden by QTimelineEntry side prop
side.description_zh: 侧面以密集舒适的布局放置时间线条目;对于松散布局，它被 QTimelineEntry 端 prop 覆盖

layout.description: Layout of the timeline. Dense keeps content and labels on one side. Comfortable keeps content on one side and labels on the opposite side. Loose puts content on both sides.
layout.description_zh: 时间线的布局。Dense 将内容和标签保持在一侧。舒适将内容放在一侧，将标签放在另一侧。松散将内容放在两边。
